results.title: Stanley Kubrick: inside the mind of a visionary filmmaker
results.brief_description:
“Stanley Kubrick: inside the mind of a visionary filmmaker” was an ACMI Screen Gallery Exhibition; 25 November 2005 - 29 January 2006. See Exhibition activity record “Stanley Kubrick : Inside the mind of a visionary filmmaker” for more information

A landmark international exhibition featuring over 1000 objects from Kubrick’s archives, including props, costumes and models from 2001: A Space Odyssey, A Clockwork Orange and The Shining.

results.title: A Writer's legacy
results.brief_description: Heather’s father believed in his daughter as a writer even when she did not believe in herself. He left her letters and memorabilia but the real legacy her father left her was the love of writing.
results.description: Heather’s father believed in his daughter as a writer even when she did not believe in herself. He left her letters and memorabilia but the real legacy her father left her was the love of writing.

results.title: Our wonderful pa
results.brief_description: Lisa’s father was born in 1932 and died in 2003 of prostate cancer. This story is a tribute to a much-loved father and grandfather.

results.title: Ode to a shoebox
results.creator_credit: Narada Lawson and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: The outside walls of the housing commission flats were as grey as a winter’s day and as cold as charity. But inside was a warm world of fun, love an adventure. This is an account of living in public housing in Melbourne.
results.description: The outside walls of the housing commission flats were as grey as a winter’s day and as cold as charity. But inside was a warm world of fun, love an adventure. This is an account of living in public housing in Melbourne.

results.title: My grandfather, the spy
results.brief_description: It was wartime when Edwina’s grandfather met her grandmother. He had a toothache and met his wife to be at the front door. Her father was the local dentist. Edwina tells her grandfather’s extraordinary life story.
results.description: It was wartime when Edwina’s grandfather met her grandmother. He had a toothache and met his wife to be at the front door. Her father was the local dentist. Edwina tells her grandfather’s extraordinary life story.

results.title: The Goodfather
results.brief_description: Joe’s dad migrated to Australia when he was a young boy. His achievements in life are what Joe celebrates in this moving tribute to his dad.

results.title: A Family story
results.brief_description: As a small child living in London Daphne witnessed the Blitz. This story is about Daphne’s life growing up in London in WW2 and her migration and settlement in Australia.

results.title: Camping legends
results.brief_description: In 1936 Fiona’s grandparents drove the inland route from Lithgow to Ayr in far North Queensland in a 1927 dodge. The journey was legendary.

results.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. [Vol. 1]
results.brief_description:
Western Stories: Expressions for the Future is an inspirational collection of works from young people who, through their association with the Western Chances program, have been given the opportunity to tell their stories and build their own bridge to the future.
Western Chances was established to ensure that financial hardship does not prevent a young person in Melbourne’s West from achieving their maximum potential in life.
